text: قال انما انا۠ رسول ربك لاهب لك غلما زكيا

translations.translation: He said, 'I am only your Lord's messenger so that He can give you a pure boy.'
He replied: "I am only a messenger from your Lord (sent) to bestow a good son on you."
He said: "I am just a message-bearer of your Lord, I have come to grant you a most pure boy."
He said, "I am the Messengers of your Lord. I have come to give you a purified son".
He said, “I am indeed one sent by your Lord; so that I may give you a chaste son.”
(The angel) said: "I am only a messenger from your Lord, (to announce) to you the gift of a righteous son."
He said: I am only a messenger of your Lord: That I will give you a pure boy.
If thou fearest God... He said, 'I am but a messenger come from thy Lord, to give thee a boy most pure.
He said: I am only a messenger of thy Lord, that I may bestow on thee a faultless son.
I am only the messenger of your Lord," he replied. "I shall bestow upon you the gift of a son endowed with purity."
He said: I am but a meenger from thy Lord that I may bestow on thee a boy pure.
He said, ‘I am only a messenger of your Lord that I may give you a pure son.’
He said: "Nay, I am only a messenger from thy Lord, (to announce) to thee the gift of a holy son.
(The angel) said: "I am only a Messenger from your Lord, (to announce) to you the gift of a righteous son."
I am the Messenger of your Lord' he replied, 'and have come to give you a pure boy'
He said, “I am only the messenger of your Lord, to give you the gift of a pure son.”
He said, "I am only the messenger of your Lord to give you [news of] a pure boy."
[19:19]   He said, ‘I am only a messenger of your Lord, that I may give you a boy [who shall be] pure’, in [his] prophethood.
(He said) Gabriel said to her: (I am only a messenger of thy Lord, that I may bestow on thee) that Allah may bestow on you (a faultless son) a righteous son.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثم لما رأى جبريل عليه لسلام من كمال عفتها وعصمتها ما رأى: { قَالَ } مستحيياً معتذارً: { إِنَّمَآ أَنَاْ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ } أرسلني إليك { لأَهَبَ لَكِ } بإذن الله إياي وأمره { غُلاَماً زَكِيّاً } [مريم: 19] طاهراً عن جميع الرذائل والآثام، مترقياً في فنوف الفضائل والكمالات إلى أقصى النهايات، مظهِراً لأنواع المعجزات والكمالات والكرامات، وأصناف الإرهاصات الخارقة للعادات
